attributes.action: The provision of Christian Religious education on a mandatory basis in all state primary and secondary schools
attributes.additional_details:
Over the last few decades we have seen a moral decline in our values as this is proved with the violence that young people cause in today's society.

What we propose would cure "Broken Britain" as Christianity teaches peace, hierarchy, acceptance, authority, manners, "love thy neighbour", etc...

We propose for Christianity to be taught in all state primary and secondary schools in the UK with regular prayers, Bible readings, church visits and local priests/vicars visiting all state schools in the UK. Christianity not only should be taught in Religious Education, but History as well.

We want the the government to change the national curriculum to be more Christian focused.
